title: Moderna, Chewy, Oracle, Nubank: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Oracle’s quarterly results beat forecasts; Nubank was extending gains after its IPO
body:
Stock futures swung higher after fresh data showed that U.S. inflation hit a 39-year high of 6.8% last month. Here’s what we’re watching in Friday’s trading action:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
